00018 DomainBase *TREX::europa::details::trex_domain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom) {
00019   EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type(dom.getDataType());
00020   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> result;
00021   
00022   // Hard coded approach for now
00023   if( type->isBool() ) {
00024     // boolean 
00025     if( dom.isSingleton() )
00026       result.reset(new BooleanDomain(dom.getSingletonValue()==0.0));
00027     else 
00028       result.reset(new BooleanDomain());
00029   } else if( type->isNumeric() ) {
00030     EUROPA::edouble e_lb, e_ub;
00031     
00032     dom.getBounds(e_lb, e_ub);
00033     if( 1.0==type->minDelta() ) {
00034       EUROPA::eint i_lb(e_lb), i_ub(e_ub);
00035       IntegerDomain::bound t_lb = IntegerDomain::minus_inf,
00036        t_ub = IntegerDomain::plus_inf;
00037 
00038       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::minus_infinity()<i_lb )
00039        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_lb);
00040       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()>i_ub )
00041        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_ub);
00042       result.reset(new IntegerDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00043     } else {
00044       FloatDomain::bound t_lb = FloatDomain::minus_inf,
00045        t_ub = FloatDomain::plus_inf;
00046 
00047       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::minus_infinity()<e_lb )
00048        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_lb);
00049       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::infinity()>e_ub )
00050        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_ub);
00051       result.reset(new FloatDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00052     }
00053   } else if( type->isString() ) {
00054     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00055     StringDomain tmp;
00056     
00057     dom.getValues(values);
00058     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00059        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00060       tmp.add(type->toString(*i));
00061     result.reset(tmp.copy());
00062   } else if( type->isEntity() ) {
00063     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00064     EuropaEntity tmp;
00065     
00066     dom.getValues(values);
00067     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00068        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00069       tmp.add(type->toString(*i));
00070     result.reset(tmp.copy());
00071   } else {
00072     throw EuropaException("Don't know how to convert europa type "+
00073                        type->getName().toString()+
00074                        " to an equivalent TREX doomain");
00075   }
00076   return result.release();
00077 }

00102 EUROPA::Domain *EuropaDomain::safe_copy(EUROPA::Domain *dom) {
00103   if( NULL!=dom ) 
00104     return dom->copy();
00105   return NULL;
00106 }

00117   if( NULL!=m_dom ) 
00118     delete m_dom;

00123 bool EuropaDomain::isFull() const {
00124   EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type = europaDomain().getDataType();
00125   return type->baseDomain()==europaDomain();
00126 }

00138 bool EuropaDomain::intersect(DomainBase const &other) const {
00139   try {
00140     europa_domain visit(europaDomain().getDataType());
00141     other.accept(visit);
00142 
00143     return europaDomain().intersects(visit.domain());
00144   } catch(...) {
00145     return false;
00146   }
00147 }
00148 
00149 bool EuropaDomain::equals(DomainBase const &other) const {
00150   try {
00151     europa_domain visit(europaDomain().getDataType());
00152     other.accept(visit);
00153 
00154     return europaDomain()==visit.domain();
00155   } catch(...) {
00156     return false;
00157   }
00158 }

00160 DomainBase *EuropaDomain::copy() const {
00161   // The EuropaDomain is just a proxy 
00162   // => convert the copy into a real TREX domain 
00163   return trex_domain(europaDomain());
00164 }

00178 DomainBase &EuropaDomain::restrictWith(DomainBase const &other) {
00179   europa_domain visit(m_dom);
00180   other.accept(visit);
00181   return *this;

00188 // callbacks
00189 
00190 void europa_domain::visit(BasicEnumerated const *dom) {
00191   if( m_dom->isEnumerated() ) {
00192     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00193     
00194     for(size_t i=0; i<dom->getSize(); ++i) {
00195       EUROPA::edouble val = m_type->createValue(dom->getStringValue(i));
00196 
00197       if( m_dom->isMember(val) )
00198        values.push_back(val);
00199     }
00200     if( values.empty() )
00201       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA domain became empty.");
00202     m_dom->empty();
00203     m_dom->insert(values);
00204   } else 
00205     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "EUROPA domain is not enumerated.");
00206 }
00207 
00208 void europa_domain::visit(BasicInterval const *dom) {
00209   if( m_dom->isInterval() ) {
00210     std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::Domain> tmp(m_dom->copy());
00211     
00212     tmp->intersect(m_type->createValue(dom->getStringLower()),
00213                  m_type->createValue(dom->getStringUpper()));
00214     if( tmp->isEmpty() )
00215       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA domain became empty.");
00216     m_dom->intersect(*tmp);
00217   } else 
00218     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "EUROPA domain is not an interval.");
00219 }
00220 
00221 void europa_domain::visit(DomainBase const *dom, bool) {
00222   Symbol const &type = dom->getTypeName();
00223   
00224   if( EuropaDomain::type_name==type ) {
00225     EuropaDomain const &dd = dynamic_cast<EuropaDomain const &>(*dom);
00226     
00227     if( !m_dom->intersect(dd.europaDomain()) )
00228       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA domain became empty.");
00229   } else 
00230     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "Don't know how to convert domain "
00231                      +type.str()+" for EUROPA");
00232 }
